Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110653,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そりゃ、修行するさ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course, I'll train.\""},{"lineNumber":110654,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前に負けたんだからな。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Because I lost to you. Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110658,"originalJapaneseLine":"「良かったではないか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't that good?"},{"lineNumber":110659,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっとと勘違いに気づけて」","translatedEnglishLine":"At least you quickly realized your misconception.\""},{"lineNumber":110660,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……まあな。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yeah. Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110661,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":110662,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺はテラ様の親衛隊だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I am Terra-sama's royal guard."},{"lineNumber":110663,"originalJapaneseLine":"　弱い親衛隊に意味なんてねぇ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no point in being a weak guard. Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110666,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……変なとこ、人間できてんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...In a strange way, you're quite mature.\""},{"lineNumber":110667,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが！　負けっぱなしじゃいられねぇ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But! I can't stay a loser! Nnnnn!\""},{"lineNumber":110668,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、強くなってお前を見返す！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, I'll get stronger and prove you wrong!"},{"lineNumber":110669,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その準備は整った！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm ready for that! I challenge you to a duel! Nnnnn!\""},{"lineNumber":110672,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん、よかろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, very well.\""},{"lineNumber":110673,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よし、なら今すぐ――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Alright, then right now—\""},{"lineNumber":110674,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、少し準備がある。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, I have some preparations to make."},{"lineNumber":110675,"originalJapaneseLine":"　時間は今夜の十時にしよう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's set the time for 10 o'clock tonight."},{"lineNumber":110676,"originalJapaneseLine":"　場所はここでやるぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"The place will be here.\""},{"lineNumber":110677,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むっ……卑怯な手はなしだぞ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph... no cheating, okay? Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110678,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前ごときにそんなもん必要ないわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someone like you doesn't need such things."},{"lineNumber":110679,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いいか、逃げるんじゃないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Listen, don't run away.\""},{"lineNumber":110680,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふんっ！　こっちの台詞だ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph! The same goes for me! Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110681,"originalJapaneseLine":"その夜――","translatedEnglishLine":"That night—"},{"lineNumber":110682,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふわぁ〜、そろそろ寝るか〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yawn~ Time to go to sleep~\""},{"lineNumber":110683,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?"},{"lineNumber":110684,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様、お出かけにならないのですか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance-sama, aren't you going out?\""},{"lineNumber":110685,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　なんか用事あったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Did I have some errand or something?\""},{"lineNumber":110686,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そろそろメガフォースさんと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's almost time for your duel with Megaforce-san."},{"lineNumber":110687,"originalJapaneseLine":"　決闘のお時間ですよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"The duel time is upon you, you know?"},{"lineNumber":110688,"originalJapaneseLine":"　火打ち石も用意しましたけど……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I also prepared some flint and steel...\""},{"lineNumber":110689,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬ー鹿、あんなん適当言っただけだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot, I just said that randomly."},{"lineNumber":110690,"originalJapaneseLine":"　最初から行く気ないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I had no intention of going from the start.\""},{"lineNumber":110691,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、ええっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, what...\""},{"lineNumber":110692,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなことよりむらっとしてきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More importantly, I'm feeling aroused."},{"lineNumber":110693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一発やるぞー」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll take a shot!\""},{"lineNumber":110694,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひゃあん！？　ら、ランス様ぁ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hyaa!? L-Lance-sama!\""},{"lineNumber":110695,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":110696,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":110697,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......\""},{"lineNumber":110698,"originalJapaneseLine":"今夜はとても寒い夜だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tonight was a very cold night."},{"lineNumber":110699,"originalJapaneseLine":"一陣の風がメガフォースの体を冷やす。","translatedEnglishLine":"A gust of wind chilled Megaforce's body."},{"lineNumber":110700,"originalJapaneseLine":"ひゅるる〜。","translatedEnglishLine":"Whooosh~."},{"lineNumber":110701,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あの野郎！！！！！！　ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That bastard!!!!!! Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110702,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むう……おかしい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... this is strange...\""},{"lineNumber":110703,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはひっかき傷を作った顔を晒したまま","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance showed the scratched face he had,"},{"lineNumber":110704,"originalJapaneseLine":"首をひねっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and tilted his head in confusion."},{"lineNumber":110705,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あのゼスの魔法兵ちゃんめ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That Zeths magic soldier girl..."},{"lineNumber":110706,"originalJapaneseLine":"　総統閣下様である俺が迫ったのに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even though I, the Supreme Commander, approached her,"},{"lineNumber":110707,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんなに嫌がることないだろうに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"she shouldn't have disliked it that much...\""},{"lineNumber":110708,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前も飽きねぇなぁ。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You just never get tired of it, huh. Nnnnn.\""},{"lineNumber":110709,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、お前か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh, it's you.\""},{"lineNumber":110710,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まーた女のケツ追ってたのか。ﾇﾇﾇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Were you chasing after women again? Nnnnn.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お前に負けたんだからな。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I lost to you. Nnnnn."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり強い方だったんだがな……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph, my confidence is shattered... Nnnnn."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とっとと勘違いに気づけて」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At least you quickly realized your misconception."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱い親衛隊に意味なんてねぇ。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no point in being a weak guard. Nnnnn."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこで自分の実力を勘違いせずに済んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was able to avoid mistaking my strength back there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その点は、むしろ感謝してる……ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For that, I'm rather thankful... Nnnnn."
"...In a strange way, you're quite mature."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが！　負けっぱなしじゃいられねぇ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But! I can't stay a loser! Nnnnn!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、強くなってお前を見返す！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, I'll get stronger and prove you wrong!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その準備は整った！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
「ランス！　お前に決闘を申し込む！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lance! I challenge you to a duel! Nnnnn!"
"No, I have some preparations to make.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時間は今夜の十時にしよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's set the time for 10 o'clock tonight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前ごときにそんなもん必要ないわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someone like you doesn't need such things.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいか、逃げるんじゃないぞ」
「ふんっ！　こっちの台詞だ！　ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph! The same goes for me! Nnnnn."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様、お出かけにならないのですか？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Did I have some errand or something?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そろそろメガフォースさんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's almost time for your duel with Megaforce-san.
The duel time is upon you, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 火打ち石も用意しましたけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I also prepared some flint and steel..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬ー鹿、あんなん適当言っただけだ。
最初から行く気ないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I had no intention of going from the start."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなことよりむらっとしてきた。
「ひゃあん！？　ら、ランス様ぁ！」
今夜はとても寒い夜だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tonight was a very cold night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一陣の風がメガフォースの体を冷やす。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A gust of wind chilled Megaforce's body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはひっかき傷を作った顔を晒したまま
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance showed the scratched face he had,
and tilted his head in confusion.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あのゼスの魔法兵ちゃんめ……
総統閣下様である俺が迫ったのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though I, the Supreme Commander, approached her,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんなに嫌がることないだろうに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she shouldn't have disliked it that much..."
"...You just never get tired of it, huh. Nnnnn."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まーた女のケツ追ってたのか。ﾇﾇﾇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Were you chasing after women again? Nnnnn."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though I, the Supreme Commander, approached her,
